root.description: Compute the ground elevation based on one or multiple stereo pair(s)

parameter.name: Input images list
parameter.description: The list of images.

parameter.name: Couples list
parameter.description: List of index of couples im image list. Couples must be separated by a comma. (index start at 0). for example : 0 1,1 2 will process a first couple composed of the first and the second image in image list, then the first and the third image . note that images are handled by pairs. if left empty couples are created from input index i.e. a first couple will be composed of the first and second image, a second couple with third and fourth image etc. (in this case image list must be even).

parameter.name: Image channel used for the block matching
parameter.description: Used channel for block matching (used for all images)

parameter.name: Default elevation
parameter.description: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.

parameter.name: Output resolution
parameter.description: Spatial sampling distance of the output elevation : the cell size (in m)

parameter.name: NoData value
parameter.description: DSM empty cells are filled with this value (optional -32768 by default)

parameter.name: Method to fuse measures in each DSM cell
parameter.description: This parameter allows choosing the method used to fuse elevation measurements in each output DSM cell

parameter.name: Output DSM
parameter.description: Output elevation image

parameter.name: Upper Left X
parameter.description: Cartographic X coordinate of upper-left corner (meters for cartographic projections, degrees for geographic ones)

parameter.name: Upper Left Y
parameter.description: Cartographic Y coordinate of the upper-left corner (meters for cartographic projections, degrees for geographic ones)

parameter.name: Size X
parameter.description: Size of projected image along X (in pixels)

parameter.name: Size Y
parameter.description: Size of projected image along Y (in pixels)

parameter.name: Pixel Size X
parameter.description: Size of each pixel along X axis (meters for cartographic projections, degrees for geographic ones)

parameter.name: Pixel Size Y
parameter.description: Size of each pixel along Y axis (meters for cartographic projections, degrees for geographic ones)

parameter.name: Output Cartographic Map Projection
parameter.description: Parameters of the output map projection to be used.

parameter.name: Zone number
parameter.description: The zone number ranges from 1 to 60 and allows defining the transverse mercator projection (along with the hemisphere)

parameter.name: Northern Hemisphere
parameter.description: The transverse mercator projections are defined by their zone number as well as the hemisphere. Activate this parameter if your image is in the northern hemisphere.

parameter.name: EPSG Code
parameter.description: See www.spatialreference.org to find which EPSG code is associated to your projection

parameter.name: Step of the displacement grid (in pixels)
parameter.description: Stereo-rectification displacement grid only varies slowly. Therefore, it is recommended to use a coarser grid (higher step value) in case of large images

parameter.name: Sub-sampling rate for epipolar grid inversion
parameter.description: Grid inversion is an heavy process that implies spline regression on control points. To avoid eating to much memory, this parameter allows sub-sampling first the field to invert.

parameter.name: p value
parameter.description: Value of the p parameter in Lp pseudo-norm (must be positive)

parameter.name: Radius of blocks for matching filter (in pixels)
parameter.description: The radius of blocks in Block-Matching (in pixels)

parameter.name: Minimum altitude offset (in meters)
parameter.description: Minimum altitude below the selected elevation source (in meters)

parameter.name: Maximum altitude offset (in meters)
parameter.description: Maximum altitude above the selected elevation source (in meters)

parameter.name: Use bijection consistency in block matching strategy
parameter.description: use bijection consistency. Right to Left correlation is computed to validate Left to Right disparities. If bijection is not found pixel is rejected.

parameter.name: Use median disparities filtering
parameter.description: disparities output can be filtered using median post filtering (disabled by default).

parameter.name: Correlation metric threshold
parameter.description: Use block matching metric output to discard pixels with low correlation value (disabled by default, float value)

parameter.name: Input left mask
parameter.description: Mask for left input image

parameter.name: Input right mask
parameter.description: Mask for right input image

parameter.name: Discard pixels with low local variance
parameter.description: This parameter allows discarding pixels whose local variance is too small (the size of the neighborhood is given by the radius parameter)

parameter.name: Available RAM (Mb)
parameter.description: Available memory for processing (in MB)
